text: Kare-ra wa anata ni taishite, don'yokudearu. Ma miruga i. Kare-ra ni kiken ga otozureru to, rinju no hito no yo ni medama o gurutto mawashite, anata o jukushi suru. Soshite kiken ga saruto yoi mono bakari musabori, kuchibiru o togara sete anata gata o tsuretsu ni hinan suru. Korera no mono wa shinjade wanai. Arra wa, kare-ra no okonai o mueki ni nasa reru. Sore wa arra ni wa yoina kotodearu
